sentences.en: "I'll be astonished if I win on Sunday," laughed Lyle.
sentences.cn: “我要是星期天能赢那就真是奇了怪了，”莱尔笑道。

sentences.en: "What about Sunday evening at Frank's?" — "Sure. What time?"
sentences.cn: “周日晚上在弗兰克家怎么样？”——“好啊，几点？”

sentences.en: Camden Market is the place to be on a Saturday or Sunday.
sentences.cn: 卡姆登市场是周末的最佳去处。

sentences.en: Developments in South Africa receive extensive coverage in The Sunday Telegraph.
sentences.cn: 《星期日电讯报》全面报道了南非的发展。

sentences.en: He's going to be up there again come Sunday.
sentences.cn: 到星期天他又会上那儿去。

sentences.en: I enjoy the omnibus edition of Eastenders on Sunday.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢看《伦敦东区》的周日连播版。

sentences.en: It being a Sunday, the old men had the day off.
sentences.cn: 因为是星期天，所以老人都休息。

sentences.en: It was always roast lamb and canned peas for Sunday lunch.
sentences.cn: 星期天午餐总是吃烤羔羊肉和豌豆罐头。

sentences.en: Naomi used to go to church in Granville every Sunday.
sentences.cn: 娜奥米以前每个星期天都去格兰维尔的教堂做礼拜。

sentences.en: On Sunday Cohen lay around the house all day.
sentences.cn: 科恩星期天一整天都在家无所事事。

sentences.en: Randall would just now be getting the Sunday paper.
sentences.cn: 兰德尔这个时候应该正在拿周日的报纸。

sentences.en: She was the belle of her Sunday School class.
sentences.cn: 在主日学校她是她们班的班花。

sentences.en: Sunday's elections should be a pointer to the public mood.
sentences.cn: 从周日的选举可以看出公众的情绪。

sentences.en: The ersatz spontaneity of "Sunday Love" sounds especially hollow.
sentences.cn: 对《星期天的爱情》这首歌的即兴模仿听起来尤其空洞。

sentences.en: The Sunday flights will make a stopover in Paris.
sentences.cn: 周日的航班将中途经停巴黎。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 拜望双亲日（英国的旧母亲节，四旬节后第四个星期日）
[宗]圣枝主日（即复活节前的星期日）
[美俚]长距离；星期日旅行（星期日从一城市转移到另一城市）
星期日泰晤士报；星期日时报

trans.tran_cn: 星期日，星期天，星期日报
trans.tran_en: the day between Saturday and Monday
the day between Saturday and Monday
